00041 #ifndef __MMDB_Manager__
00042 #define __MMDB_Manager__
00043 
00044 #include "mmdb_bondmngr.h"
00045 
00046 namespace mmdb  {
00047 
00048   // =======================  Manager  ===========================
00049 
00050   // copy masks
00051   enum COPY_MASK  {
00052     MMDBFCM_None        = 0x00000000,
00053     MMDBFCM_All         = 0xFFFFFFFF,
00054     MMDBFCM_Title       = 0x00000001,
00055     MMDBFCM_TitleKeepBM = 0x00000002,
00056     MMDBFCM_Cryst       = 0x00000004,
00057     MMDBFCM_Coord       = 0x00000008,
00058     MMDBFCM_SecStruct   = 0x00000010,
00059     MMDBFCM_HetInfo     = 0x00000020,
00060     MMDBFCM_Links       = 0x00000040,
00061     MMDBFCM_CisPeps     = 0x00000080,
00062     MMDBFCM_SA          = 0x00000100,
00063     MMDBFCM_SB          = 0x00000200,
00064     MMDBFCM_SC          = 0x00000400,
00065     MMDBFCM_Footnotes   = 0x00000800,
00066     MMDBFCM_ChainAnnot  = 0x00001000,
00067     MMDBFCM_Flags       = 0x00002000,
00068     MMDBFCM_Buffer      = 0x80000000,
00069     MMDBFCM_Top         = 0xFFFFFFF7
00070   };
00071 
00072   DefineStreamFunctions(Manager);
00073 
00074   class Manager : public BondManager  {
00075 
00076     public :
00077 
00078       Manager ();
00079       Manager ( io::RPStream Object );
00080       ~Manager();
00081 
00082 
00083       //  ---------------  Copying/Deleting  -----------------------
00084 
00085       //   Copy(..) will transfer different sort of information
00086       // between two MMDB's according to the copy mask given
00087       // (cf. MMDBFCM_XXXXX values). Note that the copying content
00088       // replaces the corresponding information (e.g. copying
00089       // coordinates will replace existing coordinates rather than
00090       // add to them).
00091       void  Copy   ( PManager MMDB, COPY_MASK CopyMask );
00092 
00093       //   Delete(..) deletes different sort of information from
00094       // the MMDB according to the delete mask given.
00095       void  Delete ( word DelMask );  // DelMask is the same as CopyMask
00096 
00097       PTitleContainer GetRemarks();
00098       PTitleContainer GetJournal();
00099 
00100       realtype GetResolution(); // -1.0 means no resolution record in file
00101 
00102       int   ParseBiomolecules(); // returns the number of biomolecules,
00103                                  // -2 for general format error
00104                                  // -3 for errors in BIOMT records
00105       int   GetNofBiomolecules();
00106       void  GetBiomolecules   ( PPBiomolecule & BM, int & nBMs );
00107 
00108       PBiomolecule GetBiomolecule ( int bmNo ); // bmno=0,1,..
00109                                  // returns NULL if bmNo is incorrect
00110       PManager MakeBiomolecule ( int bmNo, int modelNo=1 );
00111 
00112 
00113     protected :
00114 
00115       //  ---------------  Stream I/O  -----------------------------
00116       void  write  ( io::RFile f );
00117       void  read   ( io::RFile f );
00118 
00119   };
00120 
00121 }  // namespace mmdb
00122 
00123 #endif
